entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 2:00 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: SSW 30 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
